title: How much did CarryMinati earn on his last video which crossed 100M views? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to a post by BB ki vines he earned 520000 rs for 14 million views on his titu talks episode. So according to this if Carryminati has not got guidelines or copyright strike then Yalgaar songs crossed 108 million views so he has earned around 40 lakh rupees from his Yalgaar video if he has same cpv like BB ki vines.
